Module it.polimi.ingsw.GC24
Package model

Class Turn

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Turn
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observable<TurnObserver>
    public class Turn
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observable<TurnObserver>
    This class represents a Turn of the game. It contains all the references to the Turn State Machines as well as all the methods required to handle it

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Turn.State
      The list of names of the different States in the Turn State Machine

      • firstSelection

        public boolean firstSelection​(int builderID,
                              Coordinate c,
                              boolean specialPower)
                       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        This method calls first Selection method of the current Turn State
        Parameters:
        builderID - The ID of the Builder selected
        c - The coordinate target
        specialPower - A parameter that specifies if the first action is a special one or not
        Returns:
        True if the method is called from a legit state. False otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the Current State throws it

      • firstSelection

        Returns:
